document.full_text: al qaeda confirmed on friday that osama bin laden was dead, dispelling doubts by some muslims the group's leader had really been killed by u.s. forces, and vowed to mount more attacks on the west.
document.title: al qaeda confirms bin laden is dead, vows revenge
lines_and_colors: al qaeda confirmed on friday that osama bin laden was dead, dispelling doubts by some muslims the group's leader had really been killed by u.s. forces, and vowed to mount more attacks on the west.
